channel.title: Help with my 317
channel.description: Do i have to change the 127.0.0.1 to my host IP i made or leave the 127.0.0.1 :confused:

item.title: Help with my 317
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Yes, if you want players to connect, 127.0.0.1 is local host meaning only you can connect. If you wanna host change 127.0.0.1 to your no-ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my 317
item.dc:creator: @dzertus dzertus
item.description:
@dzertus wrote:

dude i had the same problem if u wanna have a server to every one connect follow this steps

download no-ip and make a acc, then just make a host calles “yourservername.no-ip.org/biz”
then just open it on ur pc and click select hosts and select the host u made
then download u torrent(u rly need if u want), open it then click options preferences then change the port to 43594
save and close edit ur server ip to the host u made then just run it(if u want u can run with 127.0.0.1 but other guys must connect with the host u made)

rep me + if u want ^^

Read full topic
